charinfo.name: Deva Path Pein (S)
charinfo.description: Deva Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This path is able to use itself as the epicenter of magnetism to attract or repel all objects. This path holds the most power and is the main force in battle for Pein.

abilities.name: Chakra Rod
abilities.description: Deva Path Pein (S) targets one enemy and uses Chakra Rod. When that enemy uses a new skill they will be dealt 15 piercing damage and lose 1 taijutsu, bloodline or ninjutsu chakra. This skill is invisible until triggered. This skill stacks.

abilities.name: Violent Water Wave
abilities.description: Deva Path Pein (S) uses Violent Water Wave on all enemies. For 1 turn all enemies physical or ranged skills will cost 1 additional random chakra*. Deva Path Pein (S) gains 25% damage reduction during this skill. This skill becomes Chibaku Tensei when used.

abilities.name: Universal Pull
abilities.description: Deva Path Pein (S) uses Universal Pull for 1 turn. The first enemy skill used on Deva Path Pein (S) will be countered and that enemy will be dealt 25 damage. This skill is invisible and becomes Shinra Tensei when used.

abilities.name: High Speed Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Deva Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
